name: Sexy Fighter (itch)
description:
This dude is assaulted by a gang of evil girls on his way home, it will take a lot of skill to go trough these evil, aggressive and beautiful girls.

Sexy Fighter is on development, this is only the first level of the game and it doesn't include Leveling Up and other features.

Most recent versions of the game will be published on Patreon for supporters.

List of upcoming features:

  • More levels
  • More bosses
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Character selector
  • Leveling up
  • Multiple Skills
  • Character Gallery
  • Some kind of VR Mode?
